channel.title: Opening a SendQuest [Delta]

item.title: Opening a SendQuest [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @im_hard im hard
item.description:
@im_hard wrote:

Alright, so atm im having troubles with something.

I made the lumbridge guide (NPC 2244) say “Hello what do you need help with?” and then a sendquest after it giving you options.
But when he says “Hello what do you need help with?” the interface closes in less then 2 seconds so you cant read it. Then the sendquest opens. Im just wondering how do I make it so you can read it?

My code is:

if(NPCID == 2244) { sendFrame200(4883, 591); sendFrame126(GetNpcName(2244), 4884); sendFrame126("What would you like to know "+playerName+"", 4885); sendFrame126("Click here to continue.", 4886); sendFrame75(2244, 4883); sendFrame164(4882); NpcDialogueSend = true; sendQuest("Choose a option", 2470); sendQuest("How do I explore new places?", 2471); sendQuest("How do I earn money?", 2472); sendQuest("Where can I train?", 2473); sendFrame164(2469); }[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 05, 2009, 02:06:00 am[/size][hr]Anyone :|?

Read full topic
